mainText:
Thank you for being a positive, visionary, and innovative influence in 
my life.  I will do my best to follow your example of excepting only the 
best of everything and never giving up at everything I do.  Thank you 
for changing the world through Apple.  Thank you for saving Pixar.  You 
will be missed, and I am honored to have known about you. One More Thing...

      You were the Best.
author: Tj
